text: Hanki anama ha'ma eri'za esaza zupa, ana vahe'mo'zama krafama hu'za esaza krafa kemo'a hagerimo havere eme rupokraseteno, sasa huno eramiaza nehanige'za egahaze. Hagi vahe'mo'ma kegamateno ama mopafima kesniana, kumamo'a havizantfa hina, hanizamo refite'nesnigeno kegahaze. Ana nehanigeno zagemofona hampomo avuga rufitesnigeno remsa osuno hanintiri hugahie.
